subject: Olympic Games (2024)
lead_paragraph: Boston 2024, the group that crafted Boston’s bid, had maintained that the Games would be paid for with private money, but details of the bid showed that public money would also be needed.
snippet: Boston 2024, the group that crafted Boston’s bid, had maintained that the Games would be paid for with private money, but details of the bid showed that public money would also be needed.
